import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { OwnerRm } from '../api/models'; import { OwnerService } from '../api/services'; @Component({ selector: 'app-owner-detail', templateUrl: './owner-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./owner-detail.component.css'] }) export class OwnerDetailComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private ownerService: OwnerService, private activatedRoute: ActivatedRoute) { } ownerId = '' owner: OwnerRm = {} ngOnInit(): void { this.activatedRoute.paramMap.subscribe(f => this.findOwner(f.get("ownerId"))) } findOwner = (faultId: string | null) => { this.ownerService.findOwner({id : faultId!}).subscribe(o => this.owner = o) } }

Edit Owner

Product Name: {{owner.firstname}}
